text: Cendant Corporation was an American provider of business and consumer services, primarily within the real estate and travel industries. Although it was based in New York City, the majority of its headquarters employees were in Parsippany-Troy Hills, New Jersey. It was founded in 1997. On October 23, 2005, Cendant's strategy of simplification culminated in the announcement that it would split into four separate companies, focused respectively on hotels, real estate, travel services, and rental cars. Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:2006 disestablishments in the United States Category:Defunct companies of the United States
title: Cendant
